quickstart.title: Syslog
quickstart.header: Including any syslog data from files, directories or network sources.

option.title: Consume any syslog files or directories on this Bigjava server
option.summary: Configure Bigjava to index the contents of /var/log, or other directory.

option.title: Consume syslog over UDP
option.summary: Configure Bigjava to listen for syslog data on any UDP port (514, for example).

option.title: Consume syslog over TCP
option.summary: Configure Bigjava to listen for syslog data on any TCP port.

option.title: Forward syslog from another server
option.summary: Use Bigjava's universal forwarder to send data from any machine to your Bigjava server

option.title: Get the Bigjava for *nix app
option.summary: This app collects syslog data stored in /var/log, and provides predefined dashboards and searches built on this data.
